metadata.Title: CVE-2023-22724 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: GLPI is a Free Asset and IT Management Software package. Versions prior to 10.0.6 are subject to Cross-site Scripting via malicious RSS feeds. An Administrator can import a malicious RSS feed that contains Cross Site Scripting (XSS) payloads inside RSS links. Victims who wish to visit an RSS content and click on the link will execute the Javascript. This issue is patched in 10.0.6.

criterions.comment: glpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
